Description

Hifire is a small brazilian indie games studio, always creating and experimenting on many types of games.

History

Andrei, who had previously published games under the 2k16 games name, decided to create a new and definitive name to his studio. And so Hifire was born, bringing titles like Superhero Simulator and others from 2k16 games. In 2017 Hifire released its first commercial game, and announced their next project, Underdoggo, which will come out sometime in 2018.
